name: Utility Qualities 2
description: Advanced utility qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: ELEMENT MASTER
qualities.description:
Requirement: **NATUREWALK**

The Digimon gains the ability to manipulate an aspect of nature of their associated Element that was taken with **NATUREWALK**. The Digimon may freely manipulate natural sources of the element, as well as produce unique effects based on the element in question.

Within a number of **Spaces** equal to the Digimon's **DOS**, the Digimon may also change **Difficult Terrain** associated with the chosen element into **Basic Terrain** as 1 **Action**, or vice-versa. They may also change the positioning of the terrain to create structures and trails out of it, moving a number of cubic **Spaces** of said Element equal to double their **BIT** value.

The Digimon also completely negates any **ELEMENTAL FORCE** Attacks for any Element it has with **NATUREWALK**.

qualities.name: ELEMENTAL MYRIAD
qualities.description:
Requirement: **ELEMENT MASTER**
**INCOMPATIBLE: DOMAIN CONTROL**

For each **Rank** in this Quality, the Digimon can purchase 2 additional **Ranks** of **NATUREWALK**. However, the Digimon can only use **NATUREWALK** to gain a max of +3 to any individual stat. **NATUREWALK** must still be purchased to obtain new **Ranks**.

qualities.name: DOMAIN CONTROL
qualities.description:
Requirement: **ELEMENT MASTER**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ELEMENTAL MYRIAD**

The **ELEMENT MASTER** is now capable of imbuing the area around it with an additional effect, known as a **Domain**. Creating a **Domain** requires 2 **Actions**, and a source of the Element in question to exist.

The **Domain** has a lasting duration of the user's **Stage** + 1, and the affected scope is limited to a radius equal to the same amount, which follows the Digimon as it moves.

Each **Domain** lists an Effect that occurs when it is present. These Effects are not affected by Qualities like **Resistant**, but a Digimon with a **NATUREWALK** element shared with the **DOMAIN CONTROL** Element can choose to ignore it.

qualities.name: ADAPTIVE ELEMENT
qualities.description:
Requirement: **ELEMENT MASTER**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ELEMENTAL MYRIAD**

When the Digimon takes the **DOMAIN CONTROL** Quality, instead of picking a single **Domain**, it may choose a single Element. It can now use either **Domain** when it activates **DOMAIN CONTROL** in Combat. Only one **Domain** may be active at a time.

qualities.name: ALTERED ELEMENT
qualities.description:
Requirement: **ELEMENT MASTER**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ELEMENTAL MYRIAD**

When you take the **DOMAIN CONTROL** Quality, you can choose any option instead of being limited to the Element of your **NATUREWALK**. Despite the new choice, it is still considered your Element.

qualities.name: OVERDRIVE
qualities.description:
As a **Free Action once per round**, the Digimon can attempt to put it into overdrive during its turn. The Digimon may make a **CPU (Athletics) Check**.

**Success**: the Digimon benefits from **[HASTE]** for that turn. At the end of the turn the Digimon suffers a -2 Penalty to **DOD** for one **Round**.
**Critical Success**: The Digimon ignores the penalty to **DOD**.

After this Quality has been used once, the **TN** increases by 6 for consecutive use until the end of Combat.

qualities.name: DATA SCAN
qualities.description:
Requirement: **TECHNICIAN**
As 1 **Action**, the Digimon can target one Enemy it can see and make a **BIT (Knowledge) Check**.

**Success**: The Digimon learns one of the following about the Target: Current/max **Wound Boxes**, **Core Stats**, **Derived Stats**, **Movement**/**Range**/**Effective Limit**, or one **Attack** and all its **Tags**.
**Critical Success**: The Digimon learns an additional option for each of the following Qualities it has: **TECHNICIAN**, **FIREWALL**, **TROJAN**.
